price: ߊߟߎ߫ ߣߌ߫ ߖߐ߫ ߞߊ߬ߡߊߛߐ߬ߘߐ߲߬ ߊߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߡߎ߬ߢߎ߲ ߡߍ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߸ ߛߏ ߞߏߟߊߓߊ߲ ߢߊ߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߠߋ߬ ߞߟߋ߫ ( ߞߏ߫ )
arabic: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُم بِمَا صَبَرۡتُمۡۚ فَنِعۡمَ عُقۡبَى ٱلدَّارِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: salāmun ʿalaykum bimā ṣabartum faniʿ'ma ʿuq'bā al-dāri
